20110111010046.000|20110111010047.000|CC1|ABOUT THIS MAN, JARED LOUGHNER. 
20110111010047.000|20110111010048.000|CC1|THIS IS HIS MUG SHOT RELEASED

20110111010105.000|20110111010106.000|CC1|TUCSON ON WEDNESDAY.

20110111010109.000|20110111010109.000|CC1|SHOOTING.

20110111010113.000|20110111010116.000|CC1|SILENCE FOR THE VICTIMS.

20110111010118.000|20110111010120.000|CC1|THE SAME QUESTIONS THAT         
20110111010120.000|20110111010122.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GABRIELLE GIFFORDS
20110111010122.000|20110111010124.000|CC1|HAD BEEN ASKING JUST TWO DAYS

20110111010127.000|20110111010128.000|CC1|A FRIEND.

20110111010129.000|20110111010132.000|CC1|WE CAN DO TO PROMOTE CENTRISM

20110111010145.000|20110111010146.000|CC1|BEFORE A JUDGE IN PHOENIX TODAY,
20110111010146.000|20110111010148.000|CC1|FACING THREE COUNTS OF MURDER   
20110111010148.000|20110111010149.000|CC1|AND TWO COUNTS OF ATTEMPTED

20110111010202.000|20110111010202.000|CC1|INCIDENT.

20110111010756.000|20110111010757.000|CC1|AND THEY PURSUE THAT AND THEY   
20110111010757.000|20110111010759.000|CC1|MAKE A LOT OF MONEY AT IT.      
20110111010759.000|20110111010800.000|CC1|>> VERY CLEARLY IT WAS DIRECTED 
20110111010800.000|20110111010801.000|CC1|AT YOU PERSONALLY.              
20110111010801.000|20110111010803.000|CC1|LET ME JUST SAY THIS.

20110111011429.000|20110111011532.000|CC1| STUDENTS. TODAY, WE'RE GONNA...
20110111011532.000|20110111011532.000|CC1|   [ Male Announcer ] If you've 
20110111011532.000|20110111011533.000|CC1|   had a heart attack caused by 
20110111011533.000|20110111011537.000|CC1|   a completely blocked artery, 
20110111011537.000|20110111011537.000|CC1|  another heart attack could be 
20110111011537.000|20110111011539.000|CC1|   lurking, waiting to strike.  
20110111011539.000|20110111011539.000|CC1|          A heart attack        
20110111011539.000|20110111011541.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20110111011541.000|20110111011543.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20110111011543.000|20110111011545.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20110111011545.000|20110111011545.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20110111011545.000|20110111011547.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20110111011547.000|20110111011547.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20110111011547.000|20110111011549.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20110111011549.000|20110111011549.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20110111011549.000|20110111011551.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20110111011551.000|20110111011553.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20110111011553.000|20110111011553.000|CC1|            by helping          
20110111011553.000|20110111011555.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20110111011555.000|20110111011555.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20110111011555.000|20110111011558.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20110111011558.000|20110111011558.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20110111011558.000|20110111011600.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20110111011600.000|20110111011600.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20110111011600.000|20110111011603.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20110111011603.000|20110111011605.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20110111011605.000|20110111011605.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20110111011605.000|20110111011606.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20110111011606.000|20110111011608.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20110111011608.000|20110111011608.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20110111011608.000|20110111011610.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20110111011610.000|20110111011610.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20110111011610.000|20110111011612.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20110111011612.000|20110111011613.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20110111011613.000|20110111011613.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20110111011613.000|20110111011616.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20110111011616.000|20110111011616.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20110111011616.000|20110111011618.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20110111011618.000|20110111011618.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20110111011618.000|20110111011620.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20110111011620.000|20110111011622.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20110111011622.000|20110111011622.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20110111011622.000|20110111011624.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20110111011624.000|20110111011624.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20110111011624.000|20110111011626.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20110111011626.000|20110111011626.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20110111011626.000|20110111011628.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20110111011628.000|20110111011628.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20110111011628.000|20110111011630.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20110111011630.000|20110111011630.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20110111011630.000|20110111011632.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20110111011632.000|20110111011632.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20110111011632.000|20110111011635.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20110111011635.000|20110111011636.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.  
20110111011636.000|20110111011638.000|CC1|    These may be signs of TTP,  
20110111011638.000|20110111011638.000|CC1|      a rare but potentially    
20110111011638.000|20110111011640.000|CC1|   life-threatening condition,  
20110111011640.000|20110111011640.000|CC1|   reported sometimes less than 
20110111011640.000|20110111011644.000|CC1|  2 weeks after starting PLAVIX.
20110111011644.000|20110111011644.000|CC1|     Other rare but serious     
20110111011644.000|20110111011725.000|CC1|     side effects may occur.    
20110111011725.000|20110111012317.000|SEG_01|Type=Story start
20110111011725.000|20110111012317.000|SEG|Type=Story
20110111011725.000|20110111011727.000|CC1|>>> ONE OF OUR CHIEF FOCUSES    
20110111011727.000|20110111011729.000|CC1|TONIGHT, SHOOTER JARED
